Title: Business Intelligence
HTML:
A Job? Or a Lifetime Experience? Start Yours Here!


A nossa missão é ser uma parte significativa da carreira das nossas pessoas. À medida que crescemos, cresce também a determinação em oferecer a melhor experiência aos nossos colaboradores e clientes e é exatamente isso que nos move. Somos uma empresa portuguesa de consultoria tecnológica com escritórios em Lisboa, Porto e Óbidos e representações no Brasil e Tunísia. Contamos com mais de 12 anos de expertise no mercado, e hoje somos um universo de cerca de 400 pessoas a trabalhar em contexto presencial, remoto ou híbrido em projetos em mais de 20 países.


Acreditamos que grandes pessoas fazem empresas de sucesso e por isso mesmo defendemos a valorização, reconhecimento e crescimento dos nossos profissionais.


Não queremos ser mais uma linha do teu CV, queremos que connosco vivas uma Lifetime Experience. Apostamos em formações e certificações que confirmam a tua real progressão, na promoção de um saudável work-life balance e na oferta de benefícios com impacto na tua vida pessoal e carreira.


O que procuramos

  • Formação superior em Engenharia Informática ou similar (valorizado);
  • Experiência em Business Intelligence em Tecnologia Microsoft;
  • Bons conhecimentos de Power BI;
  • Bons conhecimentos de processos ETL;
  • Bons conhecimentos de Inglês (B2/C1)


Ser Affinity

#Affinidade – Criares relações de proximidade e empatia com colegas, clientes e candidatos (e não apenas com tecnologias, linguagens e plataformas). Espírito de equipa e boa disposição;

#Ambição – Quereres fazer mais e melhor. Vontade de exceder expectativas e evoluir pessoal e profissionalmente;

#Ação – Energia para fazer acontecer. Mostrares proatividade e capacidade de iniciativa;

#Aprendizagem – Vontade de evoluir individual e coletivamente e tornares-te um expert no mercado tecnológico.


A tua #LifetimeExperience

  • Participar em projetos nacionais e internacionais numa empresa baseada em relacionamentos pessoais, na simplicidade e na eficiência, com uma ação disruptiva no mercado tecnológico;
  • Aceder a um plano de carreira e formação personalizado e diretamente proporcional ao teu desempenho e interesse;
  • Fazer parte de um ambiente acolhedor, de confiança, respeito e informalidade;
  • Integrar as nossas Affinity Communities (de desporto, tecnologia, hobbies, etc.) e participar ativamente em projetos de responsabilidade social e ambiental;
  • Tirar partido de um conjunto de benefícios, parcerias, descontos eventos e dinâmicas internas.


Para além da tua satisfação profissional queremos proporcionar-te oportunidades de lazer e convívio memoráveis e dignos de uma experiência Affinity.


Join the Experience!


Envia-nos a tua candidatura e aproveita para nos conhecer e ir acompanhando em:


https://www.instagram.com/affinityportugal/

https://www.linkedin.com/company/2701281/admin/

https://twitter.com/WithAffinity

Title: Data Analyst (w/m/d) – Data Visualization (Tableau)
Description:
Deine Aufgaben:

Du identifizierst und untersuchst die relevanten Datenquellen in Abstimmung mit den Fachabteilungen
Du erstellst Reports und Dashboards und führst Datenanalysen mit Tableau durch
Du entwickelst Prozesse zur Qualitätssteigerung und gewährleistest mit deren Umsetzung die Datenqualität/Datenintegrität
Du stellst die regelmäßige Aktualisierung der Analyseerkenntnisse sicher und entwickelst analytische Methoden und Workflows selbstständig
Optimierung und Verbesserung bestehender Dashboard Lösungen und Reporting Anwendungen mit unterschiedlichen Tools wie Tableau oder Google Data Studio
Du führst komplexe Daten aus unterschiedlichen Quellen zusammen und modellierst sie in die richtige Abhängigkeit um daraus neue Erkenntnisse zu gewinnen
Bewertung der Datengenauigkeit, Vollständigkeit und Qualität, um wiederholbare, nachhaltige Prozesse zu etablieren




Dein Profil:

Du verfügst über ein abgeschlossenes Studium der (Wirtschafts-) Informatik, -Mathematik, Wirtschaftswissenschaften oder eine vergleichbare Ausbildung
Erfahrung im Umgang mit dem Tableau Stack und analogen BI-/Analytics Tools
Fundierte Kenntnisse von klassischer Business Intelligence und Data Warehouse-Konzepten
Kenntnisse in der Datenmodellierung und -aufbereitung durch SQL-Abfragen oder Python, R, Scala Skripte sind von Vorteil
Zertifizierungen im Tableau Kontext (z.B. Qualified Associate, Certified Professional oder vergleichbare Zertifizierungen) wünschenswert
Du entwickelst mit Leidenschaft innovative Datenprodukte
Mehrjährige Berufserfahrung im Umgang mit Datenbanken und in der Pflege von komplexen Datenmodellen kannst Du vorweisen
Ein ausgeprägtes Interesse für digitale Technologien und agile Arbeitsmethoden runden Dein Profil ab
Du besitzt eine Leidenschaft für Trends und Technologien sowie ständig Neues zu lernen




Wir bieten Dir:

Ein traditions- und wertebewusstes Maklerunternehmen mit einer starken Marke, dass eine überdurchschnittliche Erfolgsstory vorzuweisen hat und sich seit Gründung auf einem zwar gesunden, aber überproportionalen Wachstumskurs befindet
Darüber hinaus ist VON POLL IMMOBILIEN eines der namhaftesten und schnellst wachsenden Immobilienunternehmen Europas
Aus- und Weiterbildung in der internen Schulungsakademie mit der Option von verschiedenen Weiterbildungsmaßnahmen und Zertifizierungen
Coaching in der Start-Phase in Theorie, Praxis und Organisation
Ein starkes Digitalisierungsbewusstsein mit einer ambitionierten Road-Map, die der Chief Digital Officer die nächsten Monate stark vorantreibt und umsetzt
Menschliches, mitarbeiterfreundliches und wertschätzendes Unternehmen
Geschäftsführer und Führungskräfte, die nicht nur nah am Markt, sondern auch nah an den Kollegen sind




Unsere Benefits:

Eine nachhaltige Zusammenarbeit in einem verlässlichen Umfeld und einem Team, in dem die Arbeit Spaß macht
39-Stunden-Woche
Option auf bis zu 2 Tage Home Office
30 Urlaubstage
Betriebliche Krankenversicherung
Betriebliche Altersvorsorge
Kostenzuschuss für die Kinderbetreuung
Mobilitätszuschuss (z.B. ÖPNV-Ticket, Company-Bike)
Essenszuschuss
Viele Möglichkeiten zur persönlichen Entwicklung und beruflichen Weiterbildung

Title: Data Analyst Power BI F/H
Description:
L’ambition d’Orange Business est de devenir l’intégrateur réseau et numérique de référence en Europe, en nous appuyant sur nos forces autour des solutions de connectivité nouvelle génération, du cloud et de la cybersécurité.

Nos 30 000 femmes et hommes présents dans 65 pays, dont chaque voix compte, sont tous animés par la même détermination et le même esprit d’équipe, pour construire les solutions digitales d’aujourd’hui et de demain et créer un impact positif pour nos clients, pour leurs salariés et pour la planète.

Nous offrons des opportunités passionnantes grâce à des projets innovants dans la data et le digital, le cloud, l’IA, la cybersécurité, l’IoT, ou encore le digital workspace et le big data. Venez vivre cette aventure avec nous !




Venez vivre cette aventure avec nous ! Notre équipe lilloise s'agrandit !




Ce poste est uniquement ouvert en CDI




Orange Business, recherche pour son site de Lille, son futur Data Analyst pour rejoindre sa team Data.

Votre quotidien ? En intégrant Orange Business, vous pouvez participer à une grande diversité d’activités dans la Data. En voici un aperçu :




Vos principales missions seront :




1/ Au démarrage du projet :

Recueillir et analyser les besoins du client
Rédiger les spécifications fonctionnelles et techniques
Estimer les charges




2/ Pendant la phase de réalisation :

Mettre en place de flux d'alimentation vers différents serveurs
Créer des requêtes SQL
Participer à la modélisation de données
Concevoir et développer des solutions frontend BI à des fins analytics & dashboarding :
Communiquer et traduire les résultats complexes et leurs implications aux parties prenantes de l'entreprise
Accompagner les Métiers dans la compréhension des Analytics et mise en oeuvre de solution "data driven"
Tester les différentes restitutions (cubes OLAP, tableaux de bord, reporting)
Mettre en œuvre des solutions industrielles exploitables, mesurables et opérables




En fonction de votre évolution et de nos enjeux, vous pouvez aussi évoluer sur des missions transverses (conseil, coaching, avant-vente, formation, audit, etc.). La prise d’initiative est toujours la bienvenue !




Qualifications :

Vous possédez 5 ans d'expérience ou plus autour d’écosystèmes BI. Vous maitrisez la chaîne de valeur du traitement de la donnée, vous savez intégrer les enjeux de sécurité des données

Vous maîtrisez Power BI sous toutes ses composantes : Power Query, Dax, ainsi que le dashboarding Power BI




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Informations supplémentaires




Être un collaborateur au sein d’Orange Business c’est :

Faire partie d’un acteur majeur dans les technologies de la Data, du Cloud & du Digital

Travailler sur des projets pour des clients de tous secteurs d'activités (banque, sport, santé, commerce de détail, service public…)
Utiliser des technologies de pointe telles que Microsoft, Docker, Qlik Sense, Java, Talend, Salesforce et bien d'autres…
Intégrer une communauté d’experts curieux et passionnés




Évoluer dans une entité où l’écoute, le partage et la confiance sont les piliers fondamentaux de notre culture :

Bénéficier d'un accompagnement personnalisé et d'un suivi de proximité grâce à nos one to one hebdomadaire avec le manager
Saisir des opportunités d'évolution de carrière au sein d'un groupe mondial offrant de multiples perspectives
Cultiver une culture de l'innovation, encourageant la créativité et la contribution d'idées novatrices
Participer à des initiatives sociales et environnementales, faisant de nous une entreprise socialement responsable




Tous nos postes sont accessibles à compétences égales, promouvant une opportunité équitable pour chacun, indépendamment de la situation de handicap.




Informations complémentaires:




Découvrez une partie de nos avantages :

Un accord télétravail de 2 à 3 jours par semaine selon tes missions
Un package avantages offrant : des réductions Orange, des titres restaurants, un accord de participation, une prime vacances et une prime à la cooptation
Une école interne, Digital Services School: faire évoluer tes compétences techniques et fonctionnelles (formations, certifications…) grâce à un accompagnement de proximité et à notre université interne
Un Forfait Mobilité Durable : contribue à notre engagement en faveur de la durabilité avec notre forfait dédié à la mobilité durable, soutenant activement des modes de déplacement respectueux de l'environnement

Show more

Title: Performance Data Analyst
Description:
Chcete se podílet na revoluci v investování do nemovitostí a pracovat s daty, která mají skutečný dopad?




Jsme Investown, česká crowdfundingová platforma, a naším cílem je zpřístupnit vyšší výnosy z nemovitostí jednoduše a každému. Rosteme, a tím nám velmi rychle přibývá počet úkolů a dat, která je potřeba zpracovat. Hledáme k nám Performance Data Analytika. Někoho, kdo má zkušenost s datovou analýzou, umí SQL a poradí si s různými datovými nástroji.




🔵 Jak bude vypadat tvá práce

Sledování klíčových metrik výkonnosti (KPI) a reporting pro interní stakeholdery.
Identifikace trendů a příležitostí na základě historických dat a tržních analýz.
Podpora strategického rozhodování prostřednictvím datových analýz a doporučení.
Analýza výkonnosti investičních projektů a portfolií v oblasti nemovitostního crowdfundingu.
Vytváření a správa datových modelů pro predikci výnosnosti a rizik.
Tech Stack: Snowflake, Keboola, Tableau, PostgreSQL.




🔵 S kým budeš nejčastěji spolupracovat

Hlavně s produktovým a marketingovým týmem.
Potkávat se taky budeš s týmem risk managementu a úvěrových analytiků.
Čeká tě spolupráce s externími “dataři” na automatizaci a vizualizaci dat pomocí BI nástrojů.




🔵 Jak si tě představujeme

Zkušenosti s analýzou dat, business intelligence nebo finanční analýzou.
Schopnost pracovat s datovými nástroji jako SQL, Power BI nebo Python (nice to have).
Znalost práce s databázemi a schopnost vytvářet sofistikované reporty.
Analytické a kritické myšlení, schopnosti interpretovat složité datové sady.
Výhodou je zkušenosti z oblasti investic, financí nebo realitního trhu.
Nehledáme někoho, kdo působil na rolích Data Engineer nebo Architect. Řešení už navržené máme, proto hledáme spíš někoho na roli Data Scientist.




🔵 Co ti nabídneme

Práci v odvětví crowdfundingového úvěrování ve firmě, kde má každý možnost ovlivnit její směr.
Premium 4 členství na naší platformě, aby se ti investice ještě více zhodnotily.
Kanceláře ve Foru Karlín, které jsou dog-friendly a mají vlastní kávový bar. Dáš si tak super espresso, flat white. Pro nadšence tu máme i Moccamaster. ☕️
Budget na osobní rozvoj, aby ses mohl/a posouvat dál.
Plně hrazenou Multisportku. 💪
Vždycky můžeš doplnit energii v našem office snack baru. 🍎
Stejně jako všichni u nás budeš mít maximální prostor pro seberealizaci. Chceme tvou iniciativu a nápady.
Čekají tě také pravidelné měsíční Product&Dev Meetups, kdy si rádi zajdeme na bowling, únikovku nebo jakoukoliv jinou aktivitu!




Tak co, potkáme se na pohovoru? 👋

Show more

Title: 🚀Data Analyst – Power BI & SQL 🚀
Description:
excelia is a multinational firm specializing in Consulting, Technology, and Professional Services, with over 25 years of experience. We provide services in more than 50 countries across Europe, Latin America, and the United States from our 9 own offices.




Are you passionate about data analysis and process optimization? At excelia, we are looking for a Data Analyst with experience in Power BI and SQL to join our team.




🔹 What will you do in this role?

Develop dashboards, KPIs, and ETL processes in the context of residential customer sales.
Monitor and optimize data processing.
Identify opportunities for improvement in reports, indicators, and processes.
Collaborate with commercial channels, support teams, and other company departments.
Conduct data and business analysis to drive decision-making.




🔹 Technical Requirements:

✔️ Advanced knowledge of SQL and Power BI.

✔️ Ability to work with Python (a plus).




🔹 What are we looking for?

✅ 1 to 3 years of experience in dashboard development, KPIs, and ETL processes.

✅ A degree in Business Intelligence, Data Analytics, or a related field (preferred).

✅ Strong communication and negotiation skills with internal clients and support teams.

✅ Goal-oriented mindset with a focus on meeting deadlines.

✅ Critical thinking and proactivity in identifying improvement opportunities.




📍 Location: Lisbon (Campo Grande)




📩 Interested? Apply now and be part of our team!

Show more

Title: Business Intelligence Analyst
Description:
Business Intelligence Consultant (Full-Time) – Düsseldorf




Are you a Business Intelligence expert passionate about Power BI and Microsoft Fabric? My customer is looking for an In-house BI Consultant to join our team in Düsseldorf on a full-time basis, with 50% travel to the office.




Your Role:

Design, develop, and optimize Power BI dashboards and reports.
Architect and implement data models & ETL pipelines using Microsoft Fabric.
Collaborate with stakeholders to translate business needs into BI solutions.
Ensure data governance, quality, and performance optimization.
Provide training and support to internal teams on BI tools and best practices.




What You Bring:

Power BI expertise – report building, DAX, data visualization.
Experience with Microsoft Fabric – data engineering, lakehouses, and governance.
Strong SQL skills for data extraction and transformation.
Ability to translate business needs into technical BI solutions.
Fluent in German
Willingness to travel to Düsseldorf 50% of the time.




What We Offer:

Hybrid work model – flexible remote and office setup.
Exciting projects with the latest BI technologies.
A collaborative and dynamic team environment
Opportunities for growth and professional development.

Title: Junior Data Analyst
Description:
Company Description




Inetum is a European leader in digital services. Inetum’s team of 28,000 consultants and specialists strive every day to make a digital impact for businesses, public sector entities and society. Inetum’s solutions aim at contributing to its clients’ performance and innovation as well as the common good.

Present in 19 countries with a dense network of sites, Inetum partners with major software publishers to meet the challenges of digital transformation with proximity and flexibility.

Driven by its ambition for growth and scale, Inetum generated sales of 2.5 billion euros in 2023.







We are looking for a junior profile with the following characteristics:

Degree in Data Science or similar.
Junior profile with good communication skills (comfortable in meetings and able to lead them).
Analytical mindset, proactive and willing to learn and work on different activities and projects.
Someone who is analytical and able to optimise processes.
Communication skills are essential
English - fluent

Show more

Company Description


Inetum is a European leader in digital services. Inetum’s team of 28,000 consultants and specialists strive every day to make a digital impact for businesses, public sector entities and society. Inetum’s solutions aim at contributing to its clients’ performance and innovation as well as the common good.

Present in 19 countries with a dense network of sites, Inetum partners with major software publishers to meet the challenges of digital transformation with proximity and flexibility.

Driven by its ambition for growth and scale, Inetum generated sales of 2.5 billion euros in 2023.



We are looking for a junior profile with the following characteristics:

  • Degree in Data Science or similar.
  • Junior profile with good communication skills (comfortable in meetings and able to lead them).
  • Analytical mindset, proactive and willing to learn and work on different activities and projects.
  • Someone who is analytical and able to optimise processes.
  • Communication skills are essential
  • English - fluent

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst who will ensure the solutions we bring to market are increasingly data-driven, while also helping to identify new business opportunities and customer growth.







Your Impact:




Work with business stakeholders & functional teams fulfilling their data needs and helping them to leverage analytics to improve their domains and act faster and make better decisions
Assisting our clients in determining how to measure and analyze the effectiveness of their business
Consult with clients to shape and define the role and success of analytics in their business
Design and develop reports/dashboards using various analytics and visualization tools
Continually optimizing existing reports/dashboards to improve performance benchmarking
Prepare and publish weekly, monthly, quarterly and ad-hoc reports/dashboards
Engage with relevant stakeholders and provide analysis, reporting and presentations to effectively communicate on insights and KPIs
Identifies and resolves any data quality issue by conducting both routine and ad-hoc data cleaning and testing
Using various tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets
Coaching and supporting key users to adopt the reporting tool.







Your Skills & Experience:




Demonstrated ability to work closely with business partners, understand requirements and provide accurate findings of analysis
Strong working knowledge of data visualization tools such as Power BI (preferably), Tableau or QlikView
Ability to analyze large datasets
Great analytical skills, self-driven and an eye for detail and quality
Solid SQL, / Power Query M, DAX, DWH concepts, BI Visualization
Good stakeholder management skills
Good team and business communication skills, including presentation and facilitation skills, and strong attention to detail; can walk through approach with technical clients or explain tricky concepts to non-technical audiences
Experience with agile methodologies and tools (eg. Jira or similar).







Nice to have:




R and/or Python experience
Google Analytics / Mipxanel / Amplitude / Adobe Analytics
A/B testing
Data Governance experience
Martech experience
Financial reporting.







Benefits of Working Here:

Besides an exciting job in a tremendous team, here's what you can expect:




A fast-paced tech environment
Continuous growth & learning
Open feedback culture
Room for own initiative & ideas
Transparency about results & strategy
Recognition & reward for hard work
Working with a flexible schedule
Medical subscription
Meal tickets
Extra vacation days - starting with 25 vacation days
Many others perks







Tremend is the newest global software engineering hub for Publicis Sapient. For over 17 years, the company has been infusing its advanced technical expertise into complex and innovative solutions that meet today's digital transformation needs and pave the way for a better and smarter future. By joining forces with Publicis Sapient we're accelerating the impact, providing a good mix of talented engineers, technology, continuous improvement, innovation, and R&D. Here, you'll have the opportunity to unleash your potential, powering up advanced software solutions for some of the world's most iconic brands. Embrace your passion for technology, creativity, and continuous improvement, and join us in making a difference through engineering.

Show more

Your Impact:


  • Work with business stakeholders & functional teams fulfilling their data needs and helping them to leverage analytics to improve their domains and act faster and make better decisions
  • Assisting our clients in determining how to measure and analyze the effectiveness of their business
  • Consult with clients to shape and define the role and success of analytics in their business

Tremend is the newest global software engineering hub for Publicis Sapient. For over 17 years, the company has been infusing its advanced technical expertise into complex and innovative solutions that meet today's digital transformation needs and pave the way for a better and smarter future. By joining forces with Publicis Sapient we're accelerating the impact, providing a good mix of talented engineers, technology, continuous improvement, innovation, and R&D. Here, you'll have the opportunity to unleash your potential, powering up advanced software solutions for some of the world's most iconic brands. Embrace your passion for technology, creativity, and continuous improvement, and join us in making a difference through engineering.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a Data Analyst seeking a new interesting challenge? 🔍

If your answer is yes, it’s your lucky day so keep reading, it can be just what you're looking for! 👀




✍️WHAT WILL YOU DO?

We are looking for a dynamic, proactive and talented person to join our team and perform the following tasks:

• Connect and analyze large datasets from multiple sources to identify trends, patterns, and key insights.

• Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to understand the data, detect anomalies, and uncover hidden patterns.

• Design and create dynamic reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate insights.

• Collaborate with data engineering teams and business stakeholders to understand their data needs and define key performance indicators (KPIs).

Design and maintain dashboards and report datasets.




🧐 WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

• Years' experience: minimum 3 years in a similar role

• Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, Power BI, Tableau.

• Strong knowledge of SQL, Power Query and DAX for querying and extracting data from databases.

• Experience with statistical tools or languages such as R, Python, or SAS or MDX is a plus.

• Familiarity with data manipulation and transformation processes, including ETL (Extract, Transform, Load).

• Upper-Intermediate level of English




📅 WHERE AND WHEN?

Workplace: Remote (Candidate should live in Spain)
Work Schedule: Business Hours




🤝 WHAT CAN WE OFFER YOU?

Permanent contract 📋 - We offer indefinite contracts from the first day.Pay and benefits 💸 - Competitive salary and a flexible compensation plan adapted to your needs (Ticket restaurant plan, Childcare Ticket, Transport Ticket and Health Insurance).Work from home 🏚️ - We offer you a financial support every month for your working from home expenses. In addition, in the first month we will give you a bonus to help you to set up your workplace👨‍💻Opportunity knocks 👍🏻 - Being a part of a growing company, we want to support your path with a career development plan and annual performance-based compensation reviews. Learn as you grow 📚 - Starting with a fantastic onboarding program, TCS has robust learning platforms that will allow you to learn and grow personal as professionally.Bring your buddy 👫 - If you have referred a friend for an open position under the BYB Scheme and she/he is hired you’ll receive a very attractive cash award.Connect globally 🌏 - Work with people from all over the world. You can feel the multicultural workforce.Benefit from being a TCSer 🎟️ – By being part of the TCS Spain family you can enjoy benefits, offers and corporate discounts on the best brands.And so on 🎉 - Appreciations, incentives, Team Building activities, diversity and inclusion programs, sustainability activities, corporative events... This has only just begun!

💡WHO ARE WE?

Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is an Information Technology (IT) company founded in 1968 as part of the Indian Tata Group and is one of the top 3 technology companies globally 🚀




With a presence in 55 countries and more than 600,000 employees, TCS is considered one of the 10 best companies to work for worldwide in 2024 according to the Top Employers Institute 🥇




TCS Spain started operations in 2001 and currently has a diverse workforce that collaborates with the main Spanish and multinational companies 🌏




TCS Spain has been certified as a Top Employer 2024 and has also been chosen as one of the 100 Best Companies to Work for in Spain in 2024 according to Forbes🏆




Among the portfolio of services, TCS has information technology services, asset-based solutions, global consulting, engineering and industrial services, digital solutions and services, application maintenance and development, quality assurance and testing services, IT infrastructure and BPS 🎯




Responsible for development, TCS Spain is committed to inclusion, diversity and sustainability, and promotes flexibility policies that support wellbeing and work-life balance 💯




WELCOME, WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU! 🚀

Title: Data Analyst - Power BI
Description:
Seleccionamos para nuestro departamento de Consultoría una Bussines Data Analyst - Power BI para nuestra oficina de Barcelona.







Vilar Riba somos una organización de asesoramiento global en los ámbitos fiscal, legal, laboral, consultoría, auditoria y M&A. Contamos con un equipo de más de 175 profesionales especializados y con una trayectoria de más de 30 años de experiencia. También formamos parte de la red Geneva Group Internacional (GGI) la sexta firma mundial de servicios profesionales a empresas.




Principales funciones

-Definición e implantación de cuadros de mando para las distintas áreas de la empresa mediante la utilización de las herramientas Business Intelligence de Microsoft Power BI.

-Obtención de datos, análisis y procesamiento de los mismos.

-Analizar y definir estrategia e identificar nuevas oportunidades

de negocio.

-Comunicación constante con cliente para la toma de requerimientos,

validación y soporte en la utilización.




Requisitos

-Formación de ingeniería, ADE o similar.

-3 años de experiencia en Proyectos de Business Intelligence.

-Experiencia en MS Power BI, lenguaje DAX, configuración de Data Gateway y funcionalidades de PowerQuery.

-Perfil analítico, dinámico y riguroso, acostumbrado a manejar y analizar indicadores de gestión de negocio.

-Valorable buen nivel de inglés.




Ofrecemos

-Proyección profesional basada en la continua adquisición de

conocimientos y experiencia participando en proyectos en organizaciones de

primer nivel.

-Excelente ambiente de trabajo.

-Formar parte de un equipo joven, motivado y altamente

especializado.

-Asumir responsabilidades con clientes.

-Formación:

-Técnica y en idiomas.

-Personalizada a tus necesidades.

-Gestionar proyectos con empresas lideres de la comarca.

-Modelo de teletrabajo híbrido.

Title: Consultant Data Intelligence - H/F - CDI
Description:
Talan est un groupe international de conseil et d’expertises technologiques qui accélère la transformation de ses clients par les leviers de l'innovation, la technologie et la data.



Depuis plus de 20 ans, Talan conseille et accompagne les entreprises et les institutions publiques dans la mise en œuvre de leurs projets de transformation et d'innovation en France et à l'international.



Présent dans 20 pays, le Groupe, certifié Great Place To Work, qui compte plus de 7200 collaborateurs, ambitionne de dépasser la barre du milliard d'euros à horizon 2025.



Nous accompagnons les entreprises dans des secteurs variés : énergie, industrie, transport, finance, luxe… à travers 3 grandes expertises :




Le Conseil en Management et Innovation (320 Consultants en France)






La valorisation des données, leurs structurations, et leurs usages (Data et Technologies)






L’intégration de solutions logicielles (Cloud et Applications Services)






Nos valeurs : engagement, respect, partage, esprit d’équipe et optimisme.



Talan est une entreprise responsable, reconnue par ses collaborateurs et attachée à la diversité.



Retrouvez nos engagements RSE ici et nos actions en faveur de la diversité ici



Des aménagements peuvent être proposés si vous êtes en situation de handicap.




Description du poste


Si vous recherchez un univers 100% Data, bienvenue au sein du pôle Data Intelligence Solutions - LE pôle Data du groupe Talan !



VOTRE ROLE SUR NOS PROJETS :



Au sein d’équipes projets, vous pourrez être en charge des missions suivantes :



- Pilotage de projets d’envergure dans des écosystèmes Data/Big Data/Cloud



- Cadrage du besoin, conception et analyses fonctionnelle et technique



- Benchmark de solutions et conseil auprès de nos clients sur les solutions technologiques à adopter, en lien avec leurs besoins



- Conseil sur l’architecture, l’exploitation et la gouvernance des données



- Maîtrise complète de la plateforme, installation et dimensionnement



- Création d’applications, manipulation de la donnée, modélisation et développement de rapports et tableaux de bord



- Rédaction de documentation fonctionnelle et/ou technique



- Formation d’utilisateurs(rices) et équipe projet



- Participation à des avant-ventes



VOTRE ROLE CHEZ TALAN :



- Réalisation de POC (Proof Of Concept)



- Être ambassadeur(drice) en participant à des événements partenaires



- Participation à des projets internes et partage de connaissances au sein de nos équipes.



#TalanFrance




Qualifications


VOTRE PROFIL :



De formation Bac+5, vous disposez d’une expérience confirmée de minimum 5 ans dans la data et disposez des compétences suivantes :



- Vous avez développé une expertise technique et fonctionnelle sur l’une des technologies suivantes : MSBI, Power BI, Tableau, Informatica, Talend, Dbt, Hadoop, Spark, Scala, Hive, Kafka, Snowflake, Azure DB, AWS, GCP, Redshift, Athena, TM1, Jedox, Big Query, Looker…



- Vous maîtrisez les concepts de base de l'informatique décisionnelle (modélisation, alimentation, restitution...) et/ou du big data



- Vous avez déjà préparé et mené des ateliers métiers



- Vous êtes capable d’appréhender le contexte métier



- La connaissance du contrôle de gestion est un plus



- Vous avez formé des utilisateurs et équipes projet



- Une ou plusieurs certifications seraient fortement appréciées



- Français lu, écrit, parlé



- L'anglais est un plus.



VOTRE SOUHAIT D’EVOLUTION :

Si vous êtes passionné(e) par l’innovation, et souhaitez élargir vos compétences technico-fonctionnelles dans la data, accéder à des fonctions de management de projet et d’équipe, participer au développement commercial et organisationnel, ou tout simplement pouvoir valoriser vos prises d’initiatives et développer de nouveaux terrains de jeux, alors rejoignez-nous !





Show more

Title: Analista de Visualización de Datos Junior
Description:
Buscamos un Analista de Visualización de Datos con formación en ingeniería, habilidades intermedias en Power BI y Excel, y un nivel intermedio de inglés. Este profesional será responsable de desarrollar informes detallados y cuadros de mando de KPI para clientes, con un enfoque en análisis y claridad visual.




Responsabilidades:

Diseñar, desarrollar y mantener dashboards interactivos en Power BI.

Elaborar informes detallados y cuadros de mando de KPI que faciliten la toma de decisiones para los clientes.

Analizar datos y generar insights para mejorar la interpretación de los informes.

Colaborar con los clientes para entender sus necesidades de reportes y personalizarlos según sus requisitos.

Gestionar y organizar datos utilizando Excel, asegurando la calidad y consistencia de la información.

Identificar oportunidades de mejora en los procesos de análisis y visualización de datos.




Requisitos:

Formación en Ingeniería (o equivalente).

Conocimientos avanzados de Power BI y Excel.

Nivel intermedio de inglés (capacidad para leer, redactar y mantener conversaciones básicas).

Habilidades analíticas y atención al detalle.

Capacidad para trabajar de manera autónoma y en equipo.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
We have partnered with a global organisation on this exciting opportunity. The successful data analyst will support internal projects across multiple areas, gathering market intelligence and data to assist in developing strategies and driving cost efficiencies.




This is a permanent role with a hybrid working model. This would suit someone with 5 years plus of data experience and you would need to be based in Cork.




Key Responsibilities:

Provide live, monthly, and quarterly reports.
Engage and collaborate with internal and external stakeholders.
Collect and analyze data to update reports, KPIs, and dashboards.
Manage and maintain contract information for compliance.
Maintain and manage data platforms and data systems.
Ensure compliance with policies and procedures.
Identify and implement process improvements to enhance efficiency.




Qualifications & Skills:

Strong analytical and data management skills.
Ability to work collaboratively across teams.
Proficiency in data systems and reporting tools is essesntial such as Excel, PowerBI, SQL, etc
Attention to detail and organizational skills.
Ability to take ownership of his/ her own remit.
Strong stakeholder management experience is essential.
Experience in data analysis, procurement, or supply chain is preferred.




This is an exciting opportunity to develop data expertise in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

Title: Data Analyst Intern
Description:
About Royaltyport:

Royaltyport assists artists and their managers in managing their music business intelligently. Our mission is to ensure artists understand their rights and income, receiving fair compensation. Founded by seasoned entrepreneurs with extensive music industry expertise, Royaltyport has recently launched its product and is already collaborating with artists like Sam Feldt, Purple Disco Machine, Oliver Heldens, and John Newman.




About You:

We’re looking for a passionate data analyst intern to join our team. You’ll collaborate closely with seasoned startup founders, experienced engineers, and our expert data lead.




Musicians receive revenue reports in various formats and from multiple sources. Your role will involve identifying errors in the data and visualising it in a way that is clear and actionable for our artists. This could involve areas of underpayment, errors in royalty calculations, or missing payments altogether. You will focus on both novel and common reporting errors in the industry. Additionally, you will become an expert on different types of royalties and develop expertise in musical earnings over the course of your internship.




We’re seeking someone who learns quickly and is eager to dive in and make a meaningful impact. If you’re not afraid to roll up your sleeves and want to play a role in a changing industry, we’d love to hear from you.




Requirements:

Must-Have:
Students pursuing an academic university degree or recent graduates in econometrics, data science, statistics, or computer/information sciences.
Strong knowledge of SQL.
Strong analytical capabilities.
Eligibility to work in the Netherlands.
Bonus Points For:
Experience with Looker Studio or visualisation platforms like PowerBi or Tableau.
Experience in Python.
Any analytical work experience.
Any kind of pre existing knowledge on music royalties.




Our Ideal Candidate:

Believes in our mission.
Able to work independently.
Thrives in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Is available at least 3 days a week, and can frequently come to our office in Amsterdam.
Is available for at least 4 months.
Passion for music and the music industry is a plus, though not required.
Proficiency in Dutch is a plus, though not required.




What We Offer:

An opportunity to work in the music industry and gain a unique peek behind the curtain.
An internship allowance of €500,-.
Learn for experienced data professionals and startup founders.




What’s next:

If you’re excited about this opportunity, send your information to hello@royaltyport.com. Sharing previous work, if applicable, is highly encouraged. The first step is an initial online meeting. We might ask you to do a technical test, depending on your level of experience.

If you’re excited about this opportunity, send your information to hello@royaltyport.com. Sharing previous work, if applicable, is highly encouraged. The first step is an initial online meeting. We might ask you to do a technical test, depending on your level of experience.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Data & AI Analyst - Data Management - Azure - Power BI - SQL




Responsibilities

Proactively oversee and coordinate complex data from multiple sources, supporting and enhancing our core professional services.
Collaborate with data architects and engineers to establish efficient data interfaces, ensure smooth data integration, and organize data into a unified schema.
Partner with data domain owners to maintain data integrity and ensure alignment with business goals, driving value creation for both clients and employees.
Assist data stewards by providing frameworks and tools that help maintain high data quality standards.
Analyse and prepare data for internal reporting and client-facing purposes.
Lead the successful integration of AI across the clients core services.
Contribute to embedding AI models into existing systems and workflows.
Ensure smooth deployment of AI solutions and monitor their performance.




Key skills and Knowledge

2+ years of work experience managing data in a highly regulated environment setting
A bachelor's or master's degree in a field with a high exposure to data analytics, such as computer science, applied mathematics, or another
proficiency with programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL
Proficiency in Microsoft Azure AI/ML tools
A solid grasp and admiration of data management frameworks
BI tools like Tableau, Power BI (the preferable option), etc.
Proficiency in Power Query/Pivot, SQL, and Excel macros

Title: JUNIOR BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE SPECIALIST
Description:
QIBIT, divisione ICT di Gi Group S.p.A., Agenzia per il Lavoro (Aut. Min. 26/11/04 Prot. n. 1101-SG), è specializzata nella selezione, formazione, inserimento e sviluppo professionale dei profili IT per il mercato italiano.

Per importante Azienda operante nel settore dei beni di lusso e rinomata per i suoi prodotti in pelle, cerchiamo un/a:




JUNIOR BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE SPECIALIST




RUOLO:

Inserita nel team di Business Intelligence, la risorsa garantirà un approccio più ampio alle metriche di business attraverso lo sviluppo di strumenti e l'implementazione di KPI in grado di supportare il management per misurare e migliorare le prestazioni aziendali. In particolare, in coordinamento con le Operations e le altre funzioni aziendali.




ATTIVITÀ:

Definizione, individuazione e qualificazione fonti dati

- Disegno ed implementazione data model

- Monitoraggio dati strategici di mercato

- Analisi dati concorrenza e benchmarck con dati interni

- Essere di supporto alle Funzioni di Business per l’individuazione di opportunità di sviluppo




REQUISITI:

· laurea in matematica, statistica, Ingegneria o equivalente

· minima esperienza lavorativa nel ruolo (anche di stage)

· conoscenza di almeno un tool usato per la Business Intelligence (Power BI. Tableau; QlikView o simili)

· conoscenza dei database relazionali e linguaggio SQL (SQL SERVER o ORACLE)




TIPOLOGIA CONTRATTUALE:

È previsto l’inserimento con contratto a tempo determinato e con possibilità di inserimento.




SEDE DI LAVORO:

Milano (smart working 1 volta a settimana)







Facciamo parte di Gi Group Holding (www.gigroupholding.it ) la prima multinazionale italiana del lavoro, nonché una delle principali realtà a livello mondiale nei servizi dedicati allo sviluppo del mercato del lavoro. Il nostro Gruppo è attivo nei seguenti campi: lavoro temporaneo, Permanent e Professional Staffing, Ricerca e Selezione, Consulenza HR, Formazione, Outsourcing, supporto alla ricollocazione e attività complementari. Siamo presenti in più di 30 Paesi in Europa, Asia e America con un team di oltre 6000 persone. I valori che ci contraddistinguono: attenzione, passione, apprendimento continuo e innovazione, collaborazione, sostenibilità, responsabilità. Consulta tutti i nostri annunci su www.qibit.it




Gi Group S.p.A. è autorizzata ad operare dal Ministero del Lavoro (Aut. Min. 26/11/2004 PROT. 1101 - SG). L’offerta si intende rivolta a candidati ambosessi, nel rispetto del D.Lgs. n. 198/2006 e ss.mm.ii. e dei Decreti Legislativi n. 215 e n. 216 del 2003 sulle parità di trattamento. I candidati sono invitati a leggere l’informativa privacy ai sensi degli artt. 13 e 14 del Reg. EU 679/2016 al seguente indirizzo www.gigroup.it/privacy-candidati

Title: Data Analyst
HTML:
We are looking for a Data Analyst to join our Inetum Team and be part of a work culture focused on innovation!


Location: Lisbon


Main Responsibilities:

  • Create business-facing dashboards with high impact data visualizations and analysis with complex data structures;
  • Work closely with the other departments and entities to identify business needs;
  • Design effective data models, develop and maintain dashboards using the appropriate tools;
  • Collect, clean, and transform data sets using ETL tools to create effective data models;
  • ...


Profile:

  • Bachelor's and/or Master's degree in Computer Science, Economics, Mathematics, Statistics or similar;
  • +3 years of experience in data analytics and dashboard development;
  • Strong experience with PowerBI/Tableau and Python;
  • Excellent communication skills;
  • Team work driven;
  • Fluent English (mandatory);
  • Hybrid work - office in Lisbon(1/2x per week).


Send your CV & join our team!

Title: Analista dati
Description:
Posizione: Analista Dati - GLS Corriere Espresso




Sede di lavoro: Catania, Sicilia




Chi siamo:

GLS Corriere Espresso è una delle principali aziende nel settore della logistica e delle spedizioni. Siamo alla ricerca di un analista dati che supporti l'ottimizzazione dei processi aziendali attraverso l'analisi avanzata dei dati.




Responsabilità:

Analizzare e monitorare i dati relativi ai flussi logistici, alle spedizioni e alle performance dei nostri servizi.
Creare report e dashboard per supportare il monitoraggio delle attività quotidiane e l'ottimizzazione dei processi.
Identificare tendenze e comportamenti nei dati per migliorare l'efficienza operativa e ridurre i costi.
Collaborare con i team operativi e manageriali per tradurre i dati in strategie aziendali concrete.
Gestire la qualità dei dati, garantendo che siano precisi, coerenti e tempestivi.
Utilizzare strumenti di analisi avanzata per prevedere e migliorare la qualità del servizio.




Requisiti:

Laurea in Statistica, Ingegneria, Informatica o discipline affini.
Preferibile esperienza minima in un ruolo simile.
Ottima conoscenza di Excel e di software di Business Intelligence (Power BI).
Forte capacità analitica e problem solving, con attenzione ai dettagli.
Ottime capacità comunicative per presentare i risultati in modo chiaro e comprensibile.
Attitudine al lavoro in team e orientamento agli obiettivi.




Cosa offriamo:

Opportunità di formazione e aggiornamento continuo su nuove tecnologie e strumenti.
Inquadramento a norma di legge in base all’esperienza pregressa.







La ricerca è per entrambi i sessi (L. 903/77).

Titolare del trattamento dei dati personali: Mediterranea Express, sede legale in Via Arsenale n.44 / G, 96100 Siracusa.

I dati personali saranno trattati ai soli fini della selezione richiesta dal candidato.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Title: Data Analyst

Experience: 2+ years of experience

Employee Status: Full Time, Permanent




My clients company provides industry-specific tools, enabling businesses to thrive in today's dynamic landscape. Their software powers a significant number of transactions daily across various global markets. Their vision is to position the businesses at the core of mobility, achieved by delivering innovative solutions and transforming industries.




Responsibilities

•Manage Reporting Systems: Oversee and improve existing reporting systems to ensure efficiency and accuracy.

•Conduct Analytical Experiments: Run experiments to help solve complex problems across different industries and domains.

•Data Mining: Identify and mine relevant data sources to meet client business needs, working with both structured and unstructured data.

•Algorithm Development: Utilize algorithms and models to mine big data stores; perform data and error analysis to refine models; clean and validate data to ensure uniformity and accuracy.

•Trend Analysis: Analyse data to uncover trends and patterns and interpret findings with clear objectives in mind.




Required Skills and Qualifications

•Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in statistics, applied mathematics, or a related field.

•Experience: 1-2 years of experience in data science. While experience is important, we value intelligence and the ability to learn quickly from our Senior Analysts.

•Technical Proficiency: Strong skills in data mining, mathematics, and statistical analysis.

•Tools Knowledge: Experience with SQL, Excel, Python, and data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI.

•Collaborative: Ability to thrive in a dynamic, research-focused environment with multiple concurrent projects.




If you are passionate about IT support and looking to thrive in a dynamic environment, we encourage you to apply.

Title: Junior Data Analyst (Identity and Fraud) - Fresh Graduate
Description:
Company Description

Experian is a global data and technology company, powering opportunities for people and businesses around the world. We help to redefine lending practices, uncover and prevent fraud, simplify healthcare, provide digital marketing solutions, and gain deeper insights into the automotive market, all using our unique combination of data, analytics and software. We also assist millions of people to accomplish their financial goals and help them to save time and money.

We operate across a range of markets, from financial services to healthcare, automotive, agribusiness, insurance, and many more industry segments.

We invest in accomplished people and new advanced technologies to unlock the power of data and improve. As a FTSE 100 Index company listed on the London Stock Exchange (EXPN), we have a team of 22,500 people across 32 countries. Our corporate headquarters are in Dublin, Ireland.

Job Description

What you'll be doing:

You will provide data processing, services and solutions, within a data environment, to businesses with simple and complex needs. You will work for clients across many sectors including Banking, Financial Services and Automotive.


Engage with Account Managers and clients to ensure requirements and data deliveries are understood and fulfilled to expectations.
Demonstrates effective communication and collaboration with internal and external stakeholders to ensure high quality deliveries to our clients
Run simple and complex batch processes to deliver data to clients.
Simple and complex coding to extract data from files to underpin data activities.
Involvement in delivery of high-quality work within agreed timescales, contributing to overall client project goals
Provision of counts and profile analysis to support campaign and strategic activity for clients
Manage creating, modifying and monitoring of automated processes for clients
Maintain the codebase and incorporate any new developments


You will report into the Senior Delivery Consultant

Qualifications

What you'll need to bring:


University degree with a high numerical content (such as Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, etc.);
Experience of SQL
Demonstrate analytical thinking with experience solving numerical and data problem
Understanding of data, data structures and their value regarding use for data processing and data delivery
Experienced in building relationships with colleagues by email, phone, video conference and face-to-face meetings
Experience managing multiple tasks
Fluent English


Additional Information

What you will get:


Personal Development - career pathway for professional growth supported by learning and development programs and unlimited access to online educational training courses, learning materials & book.
Work environment - excellent work conditions with friendly environment, recognized team spirit, and fun and quality recreation time.
Social benefit package including life insurance, food vouchers, additional health insurance, monthly flex allowance and internet coverage, corporate discounts, marriage and childbirth / adoption allowance, Multisport card, Sharesave plan, Employee assistance program, а birthday gift and many other benefits!
Work-life balance - 25 days paid vacation, 1 additional day off for your birthday and extra 3 paid days for participation in Social responsibility event.
Opportunity for Flexible working hours and Home Office.


Experian is an Equal opportunity employer. Everyone can succeed at Experian and bring their whole self to work, irrespective of their gender, ethnicity, religion, colour, sexuality, physical ability or age. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know at the earliest opportunity.

Experian Careers - Creating a better tomorrow together

Find out what its like to work for Experian by clicking here

Title: Data Analyst
HTML:
Cosa Farai In Quanto Data Analyst

  • Conoscerai e parteciperai alla selezione delle fonti di dati più appropriate per le finalità della nostra organizzazione, garantendo un flusso costante di informazioni rilevanti;
  • Sarai coinvolto nella progettazione e governance di interventi completi per l'acquisizione, elaborazione, integrazione e analisi dei dati, contribuendo alla creazione di solide basi informative;
  • Parteciperai alle attività di implementazione e gestione delle soluzioni legate al Forecast della domanda/immissione presso i clienti del settore Power & Gas;
  • Utilizzerai linguaggi quali Python o R per l’analisi dei dati;
  • Avrai l'opportunità di comprendere e analizzare il funzionamento dei mercati Utility, nonché di esplorare il potenziale strategico della Business Analytics;

L'esperienza e le abilità che ti rendono la persona giusta:

  • Laurea in discipline STEM preferibilmente con indirizzi o specializzazioni legate al mondo Data;
  • Conoscenza base SQL ed utilizzo di client tool SQL;
  • Buona conoscenza pacchetto Office, in particolare Excel;
  • Passione per l'analisi dei dati e desiderio di apprendere e crescere nel campo;
  • Conoscenza a livello universitario di Python, e/o R, e/o Matlab;
  • Conoscenza ottima della lingua inglese;

Le Caratteristiche Che Ti Fanno Spiccare Tra i Candidati

  • Capacità di comunicare in modo chiaro ed efficace con diversi stakeholder;
  • Orientamento ai dettagli e capacità di problem solving;
  • Esperienza professionale pregressa in linea in società di prodotto e/o consulenza diretta al cliente;
  • Esperienza accademica o professionale di utilizzo di strumenti di Business intelligence; Conoscenza del settore Power & Gas;

Mindset.

Le persone che lavorano con noi non sono “dipendenti”, sono talenti che contribuiscono, ciascuno nel proprio settore, alla creazione di un luogo senza confini spaziali e mentali, dove aspirazioni, obiettivi, entusiasmi e strategie si fondono in un percorso virtuoso di evoluzione condivisa, per crescere ed esprimere il massimo del proprio potenziale.

Il gruppo Symphonie ha creato un ambiente di lavoro in cui ogni persona ha la possibilità di esprimere e sviluppare le proprie potenzialità a pieno. Promuoviamo l'indifferenza di genere, età, cultura, lingua, religione, idee politiche, orientamento sessuale, abilità psicofisiche, condizioni personali e sociali, mettendo in primo piano le persone, i loro meriti, le loro abilità e la loro passione.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!




We are looking for an Amazing: Data Analyst




The amazing you, will have:

Bachelor's and/or master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or similar;
At least 5 years as a data analyst
Experience with PowerBI/Tableau
Fluent in English and Portuguese;
Good communication and interpersonal skills;
Be already in Portugal legally, available to do a hybrid model in Lisbon.




Why should you become part of our family?

You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!







Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been electedWe believe transparency, trust and integrity are the pillars of any business and relationship and that is what we promise our clients and employees who join our company KCS IT.




Here, you can be totally sure about this: we value each person that joins us. We welcome everyone as part of this family and we do everything we can so that we can learn and grow together.




At KCS IT, we stand for equality and value diversity. We foster a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for all employees!

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit.

All applications with the required skills for the position are welcome!

HTML:
We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!


We are looking for an Amazing: Data Analyst


The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's and/or master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or similar;
  • At least 5 years as a data analyst
  • Experience with PowerBI/Tableau
  • Fluent in English and Portuguese;
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills;
  • Be already in Portugal legally, available to do a hybrid model in Lisbon.


Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
  • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
  • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
  • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!



Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Title: Data Analyst
HTML:
What You Will Do

  • Collect and compile data from various sources, including databases, spreadsheets, and online sources Interpret data and analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports to management;
  • Develop and implement data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and data quality Identify trends, patterns, and insights in complex data sets to inform business strategies;
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure data integrity and accuracy;
  • Support data-driven decision-making by providing actionable recommendations and insights based on analysis;
  • Stay up-to-date on industry trends and best practices in data analytics and make recommendations for process improvements.

What You Need

  • 3+ years of experience as Data Analyst;
  • Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or related;
  • Experience in data analysis, SQL, Excel, Tableau/Power BI/QlikView, Python;
  • Experience analyze data, provide insights, create reports & dashboards, support decision-making;
  • Working with ML would be a big plus;
  • Upper Intermediate English Proficiency.

What's In It For You

  • Ownership – we trust that you will do the right things to deliver maximum impact.
  • Transparency – we say what we think and every voice is heard and respected, even when our opinions differ.
  • Service – whether it’s for our customers or teammates, we always support each other.
  • No bureaucracy, no micromanagement.
  • Flexible working schedule – you plan your working day based on your tasks and meetings.
  • Corporate events and various team buildings.
  • Sigli Academy: Initial Training Programs, How it Works & more.

Title: Data Analist
HTML:
Voor een opdrachtgever in Amsterdam ben ik op zoek naar een Data Consultant.


Functieomschrijving

Als Data Consultant ben jij bezig met diverse projecten bij hun opdrachtgevers. Je ontwerpt en bouwt informatieproducten voor zorginstellingen. Data delen met externe, het verbeteren van kwaliteit en het wetenschappelijk onderzoek spelen hierin een grote rol.


Jij bent de onmisbare schakel die grove data weet om te zetten in vernieuwende datatoepassingen en je weet de wensen van stakeholders juist in kaart te brengen.


Taken:

  • Je gaat een DWH ontwerpen en/of implementeren voor zorginstellingen;
  • Je gaat dashboard en rapportages ontwikkelen voor helder inzicht;
  • Je zorgt dat in een app ingevulde gegevens in het DWH terecht komen.


Wat breng jij mee?

  • Je hebt HBO- werk en denkniveau;
  • Minimaal 3 jaar werkervaring in vergelijkbare rollen;
  • Je hebt ervaring met Databases en SQL;
  • Affiniteit met zorg is een pre.


Wat krijg je van ons?

  • Aantrekkelijk salaris tot € 5.500 bruto per maand;
  • Vergoeding om je werkplek thuis in te richten, hybride werken kan dus bij ons!;
  • Mogelijkheden voor opleidingen en cursussen;
  • Goede mobiliteitsvergoeding.


📧 cheyenne.eijkhoudt@mcflybrown.com

☎️ 0619028768

Title: Analista de datos SQL/PowerBI
Description:
NTT DATA BPO, es una sociedad perteneciente al grupo NTT DATA, la cual presta servicios de externalización de procesos de negocio. NTT DATA es una consultora multinacional que ofrece soluciones de negocio, estrategia, desarrollo y mantenimiento de aplicaciones tecnológicas, y outsourcing. La compañía, desarrolla su actividad en los sectores de telecomunicaciones, entidades financieras, industria, utilities, energía, administración pública y sanidad.




Somos la sexta compañía de servicios IT del mundo, lo que nos permite dar soluciones y servicios en diversas áreas, aumentando las capacidades, recursos tecnológicos, geográficos y financieros de nuestros clientes, además de ayudarles dando las respuestas más innovadoras.




Somos una de las pocas compañías en España, con los estándares más altos de excelencia en las condiciones que ofrecemos a nuestros empleados, por eso estamos certificados como Top Employer desde 2016 hasta la actualidad. Apostamos por nuestros empleados y creemos por encima de todo en las personas y en su desarrollo integral, por lo que fomentamos un contexto de libertad responsable que se traduce en un alto rendimiento profesional.




Para nuestra oficina de Madrid buscamos una persona con experiencia en análisis de datos y reporting, cuyas funciones serán apoyar en soluciones automatización de procesos web y entornos colaborativos que permitan la automatización de tareas administrativas.




Conocimientos necesarios:




Conocimiento de bases de datos y modelos de datos.
Conocimiento de SQL y PowerBI.
Experiencia en la explotación, análisis y construcción de reporting.
Experiencia soluciones de grabación de interacciones o similares.




Te ofrecemos formar parte del equipo de profesionales de NTT DATA BPO , lo que significa que desde el primer día ponemos todos los mecanismos necesarios en funcionamiento para que tengas un plan de carrera y formación especializada para el desempeño de tus funciones profesionales:




Contrato Indefinido.
Plan de Carrera profesional en función de la formación, experiencia, potencial profesional y expectativas del candidato.
Formación desde el primer día dirigida a la especialización técnica y de transformación digital.
Salario en función de la experiencia del candidato.
Horario Lunes a Viernes : de 8:00 a 17:00 (con hora para comer).
Modelo Híbrido.
Integrarte en una compañía multinacional líder (Una de las 10 compañías más grandes del sector a nivel mundial), joven y dinámica.
Formar parte de un ambiente creativo y colaborador donde puedes disfrutar de la experiencia del trabajo en equipo para lograr el máximo valor para nuestros clientes.
Trabajar en una empresa en constante evolución y crecimiento, realizando un trabajo enriquecedor con grandes oportunidades de desarrollo profesional.
Participación en proyectos innovadores y punteros para grandes clientes de primer nivel en distintos sectores de mercado.




Si eres una persona con buena comunicación, proactiva, que se sienta cómoda trabajando en equipo, no dudes en aplicar.

Title: (Junior) Data Analyst (w/m/d)
Description:
About

Herzlich Willkommen bei der MSR Consulting Group.

Als führende Unternehmensberatung begleiten wir Klienten aus den Branchen Automotive & Mobility sowie Financial Services und Industrial Goods auf ihrem Weg zum Best-in-Class. Unser Ziel: Die Welt für Kunden besser machen.

Bei uns erwartet dich Teamgeist, eigenverantwortliches Arbeiten und gemeinsame Entwicklung. Mit einer kununu-Bewertung von 4,4 von 5 sind wir stolz auf die Zufriedenheit unserer Mitarbeitenden und unsere offene Unternehmenskultur.

Werde Teil unseres Teams und gestalte mit uns die Zukunft!

(Junior) Data Analyst (w⁠/⁠m⁠/⁠d)

Arbeitsort: Köln | Full-time employee | AB SOFORT

So kann Deine Arbeiswoche bei uns aussehen

Intensive Python-Schulung

Erstellung eines Fragebogens für eine Kundenzufriedenheitsstudie

Online-Termin mit einem externen Felddienstleister zur Umsetzung einer Befragung

Team-Meeting im Büro zum Projektupdate

Bereinigung und Quality-Check von bereitgestellten Kundendaten

Auswertungen der Befragungsdaten und Ermittlung von Service-Level-Standards

Treiberanalysen mit Hilfe multivariater Regressionsanalysen zur Identifikation der wichtigsten Handlungsfelder

Erstellung einer Ergebnis-Präsentation in PowerPoint für einen Klienten mit konkreten Lösungsansätzen

Interne Weiterbildung zum Thema „Gewichtung in der Marktforschung“ und persönliches Treffen mit den Kolleg*innen im Büro

Darauf kannst Du Dich bei MSR freuen

Spannende Projekte: Unbefristeter Job, abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben und schnelle Verantwortung für eigene Aufgaben

Teamarbeit: Kurze Wege, regelmäßiger Austausch und Feedback

Top Einarbeitung: Individuelles Onboarding mit Mentor und monatliche Weiterbildungen an der MSR Academy

Entwicklung: Halbjährliche Mitarbeitergespräche und klare Karriereschritte

Attraktive Vergütung: Systematische Gehaltsentwicklung, Deutschlandticket & Firmenbike sowie Bezuschussung zum Urban Sport Club

Teamgeist: Jährliches Europa-Seminar, Team-Events & Feel Good-Aktivitäten

Flexibilität: Modernes Büro mit großem Garten, Home-Office-Möglichkeit, flexible Arbeitszeiten

Work-Life-Balance: 29 Tage Urlaub zzgl. Rosenmontag sowie die Option auf Sabbatical und weitere freie Tage

… und selbstverständlich dürfen auch bei uns kostenloser Kaffee, Tee und der wöchentliche bunte Obstkorb nicht fehlen

Das bringst Du idealerweise mit

Sehr gut abgeschlossenes Studium mit Bezug zu statistischen/ empirischen Inhalten

(Erste) Erfahrungen in der Anwendung von multivariaten Analyseverfahren

Du hast erste Kenntnisse in einer Statistiksoftware wie SPSS/ STATA oder einer Programmiersprache wie z.B. Python, R oder VBA gesammelt (kein Muss)

Falls Du bereits eigene Projekte als Showcase umgesetzt hast (z.B. auf GitHub), teile diese gerne mit uns

Du arbeitest eigenständig, verbindlich sowie lösungsorientiert und bist interessiert, technische Kompetenzen zu entwickeln

Fließende Deutschkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift sind unbedingt erforderlich

Kontakt

Teresa Höhl (Talent Acquisition + Employer Branding)

Tel.: 0221 4892813

Mail.: teresa.hoehl(at)msr.de


Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany


Languages


German

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
FP Markets Group of Companies is a well-established globally regulated Australian broker offering traders access to CFDs across Forex, Indices, Commodities, Stocks and Cryptocurrencies. We are growing and looking to recruit a Full-Time Data Analyst in our Cyprus office - a certified Great Place to Work®.


We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Data Analyst with expertise in Power BI to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing data, generating reports, and building dashboards to support business decision-making. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to transform data into actionable insights.


Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain interactive Power BI dashboards and reports to visualize business data
Analyze complex datasets to provide actionable insights and recommendations
Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand reporting requirements and translate them into efficient data models
Optimize Power BI solutions for performance and scalability
Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and security across all reporting solutions
Automate and streamline reporting processes to improve efficiency
Conduct ad-hoc data analysis and support business teams with data-driven decision-making



Candidate profile:

Bachelor's degree in Data Analytics, Computer Science, Business Intelligence, Statistics, or a related field
Proven experience as a Data Analyst, BI Analyst, or a similar role
Strong expertise in Microsoft Power BI, including DAX, Power Query (M), and Power BI Service
Knowledge of Excel (Advanced Formulas, Pivot Tables, Power Pivot, Power Query)
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail
Excellent communication and presentation skills to explain data insights to non-technical stakeholders
Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment



Nice-to-Have:

Forex Industry knowledge


Our offer:

Welcoming, young and multicultural team with approachable leadership
Continuous personal development, growth with the company and opportunity to learn from industry leaders
Competitive remuneration, regular salary reviews and performance-based incentive schemes
Vibrant company life: from team activities to global celebrations
New beautiful office in an easily accessible location with company-provided fruits, breakfasts and lunches
Free Gym membership and access to multiple sports and wellness facilities
Company-provided parking
Medical insurance, pension fund after the probation period



Journey to FP Markets:

Interview with People Function (45 min - 1 hour) to assess match to our culture and company
Interview with the future Hiring Manager  (45 min - 1 hour) to assess match to the job and the team



Join our team and be a part of a professional, rapidly-growing company operating in a multicultural environment!

Show more
HTML:
FP Markets Group of Companies is a well-established globally regulated Australian broker offering traders access to CFDs across Forex, Indices, Commodities, Stocks and Cryptocurrencies. We are growing and looking to recruit a Full-Time Data Analyst in our Cyprus office - a certified Great Place to Work®.

We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Data Analyst with expertise in Power BI to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing data, generating reports, and building dashboards to support business decision-making. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to transform data into actionable insights.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain interactive Power BI dashboards and reports to visualize business data
  • Analyze complex datasets to provide actionable insights and recommendations
  • Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand reporting requirements and translate them into efficient data models
  • Optimize Power BI solutions for performance and scalability
  • Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and security across all reporting solutions
  • Automate and streamline reporting processes to improve efficiency
  • Conduct ad-hoc data analysis and support business teams with data-driven decision-making

Candidate profile:

  • Bachelor's degree in Data Analytics, Computer Science, Business Intelligence, Statistics, or a related field
  • Proven experience as a Data Analyst, BI Analyst, or a similar role
  • Strong expertise in Microsoft Power BI, including DAX, Power Query (M), and Power BI Service
  • Knowledge of Excel (Advanced Formulas, Pivot Tables, Power Pivot, Power Query)
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills to explain data insights to non-technical stakeholders
  • Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment

Nice-to-Have:

  • Forex Industry knowledge

Our offer:

  • Welcoming, young and multicultural team with approachable leadership
  • Continuous personal development, growth with the company and opportunity to learn from industry leaders
  • Competitive remuneration, regular salary reviews and performance-based incentive schemes
  • Vibrant company life: from team activities to global celebrations
  • New beautiful office in an easily accessible location with company-provided fruits, breakfasts and lunches
  • Free Gym membership and access to multiple sports and wellness facilities
  • Company-provided parking
  • Medical insurance, pension fund after the probation period

Journey to FP Markets:

  • Interview with People Function (45 min - 1 hour) to assess match to our culture and company
  • Interview with the future Hiring Manager  (45 min - 1 hour) to assess match to the job and the team

Join our team and be a part of a professional, rapidly-growing company operating in a multicultural environment!

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
L’Open Banking è il nostro DNA!




Centrico ha le sue radici nelle rivoluzioni tecnologiche guidate dal gruppo Sella e dal 2019 è una realtà indipendente: creiamo innovazione per il mondo delle banche e della finanza con un sistema informativo aperto, veloce, modulabile e conveniente.




Il nostro obiettivo è diventare una data driven company!

Per vincere questa sfida, la persona che cerchiamo farà parte dell’area Data Management di Centrico in qualità di Data Analyst e si occuperà di analizzare i dati per fornire insights utili a supporto dei processi decisionali interni al Gruppo.




Responsabilità:

Analizzerai grandi quantità di dati per identificare trend, pattern e insights utili
Creerai report e dashboard per visualizzare i dati in modo chiaro e comprensibile
Collaborerai con team multidisciplinari (Business, IT, Compliance, Risk) per comprendere le esigenze di analisi dei dati e fornire soluzioni data-driven
Supporterai l’individuazione di regole e di livelli di controllo dell'accesso ai dati
Contribuirai al miglioramento continuo della piattaforma dati del Gruppo tramite l’implementazione di best practice e standard di settore




Requisiti:

Esperienza di almeno 4 anni nel medesimo ruolo o in ruolo affine
Laurea in discipline STEM
Conoscenza avanzata di strumenti di analisi dati (es. SQL, Python, R)
Buona conoscenza di strumenti di visualizzazione dati (es. Power BI, Tableau)
Ottime capacità relazionali sia verso interlocutori tecnici sia di business
Spiccate capacità analitiche e di problem solving




Nice to have:

Esperienza con tecnologie di big data (es. Hadoop, Spark)
Conoscenza di tecniche di machine learning e data mining
Esperienza con strumenti di ETL (es. Talend, Informatica)
Certificazioni professionali in ambito data analysis (es. Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate)
Conoscenza di metodologie Agile e Scrum




Cosa offriamo:

Un ambiente positivo e in cui il tuo contributo venga apprezzato, la tua opinione è importante e vogliamo che tu la esprima
Piattaforma e-learning Microsoft: per non smettere mai di imparare e di certificarti
Attività di engagement (tornei di Beach Volley, Padel, Calcetto) e di volontariato aziendale
Contratto con CCNL del Credito
Cura della persona anche con la polizza sanitaria - per te e il tuo nucleo familiare - e polizza TCM
Supporto al benessere psicologico attraverso Stimulus, uno sportello esterno di ascolto a disposizione dei colleghi e dei loro famigliari
Uno sguardo al tuo futuro attraverso il contributo aziendale al fondo pensione
Policy di lavoro flessibile




Sede di lavoro: Milano o Torino o Biella con modalità ibrida.

Title: Analista de datos
Description:
Antes de que te preguntes quiénes somos, te lo contamos...




Avalora es una empresa del sector tecnológico perteneciente a OHLA Group. Nuestras raíces comenzaron en Madrid, pero actualmente estamos en todo el país; incluso tenemos sedes en Chile y Perú.




No somos una big four, ni pretendemos serlo. Somos un grupo de compañeros pero también amigos que comparten una serie de beneficios como:




Seguro médico de salud (Sanitas). ⚕🏥
Clases de inglés para que puedas seguir perfeccionando el idioma, ¡Una divertida experiencia mientras aprendes! 🔛🌍🔝
Plan de retribución flexible, para que puedas destinar tu sueldo a lo que necesites: tickets restaurante, tickets guardería, seguro médico para tus familiares, plan de jubilación... 💱 🚄 🚌 👴 👵 👩‍🎓 👨‍🎓 👶 👧 👦 🍽 🏥
Plan de formación continua con gran variedad de cursos que puedan satisfacer tus necesidades (OpenWebinars, KnowBe4, UiPath...). Acceso 24x7, para que puedas formarte dónde y cuándo quieras. 👩‍🏫 👨‍🏫 🏫
Plan de Certificaciones: Somos partner de Microsoft, Uipath, Checkpoint ... entre otros por lo que podrás beneficiarte de nuestro plan. 🎓 👩‍🎓 👨‍🎓
VIP OHLA: Descuentos en multitud de empresas de ocio, tecnología, etc. ❗ ❗ ❗
22 días laborales de vacaciones por año trabajado. 🏕 🏖 🏜 😎




¡Únete a nuestro equipo!

Queremos contar con un perfil de Analista de Datos para trabajar en uno de nuestros clientes, en modalidad de teletrabajo 100% (dentro de España).







MODALIDAD: 100% remoto, pero pueden solicitar que acuda a oficina puntualmente.

CENTRO DE TRABAJO: San Fernando de Henares, Madrid




PERFIL

Análisis de datos y realización de Dashboard de KPIs, Principalmente en Power BI y valorable otras como Salesforce.
Elaboración de informes, análisis y preparación de datos para reporting, análisis y seguimiento de datos pipeline y comparativos.
Utilización y soporte de las herramientas corporativas para la gestión comercial y registro de la actividad comercial.




TITULACIÓN: ADE o Ingeniería

NIVEL DE INGLÉS: ALTO




Contrato indefinido con nosotros, dando servicio a un cliente.




Banda salarial: 25 - 30.000€ brutos anuales (14 pagas). Negociables en función de la experiencia.




Si tienes dudas escríbenos: seleccion@avalora.com




¡Estaremos encantados de hablar contigo!
